long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plugin that allows users to read certain meta tags from a website.
Checks if it uses Carlsberg Compliance pack which is a script for Cookie Management, and if the website has the proper compliance links. It checks if the domain belongs to Carlsberg Group as well. 
In a nutshell, Loki gives the user the possibility of checking if a website under Carlsberg Group umbrella, is compliant with the internal company policies.
